column2: I understand that the information I provide in this form will be made publicly available.
column3: Q1: What information would you like us to know about your needs, priorities, desires and concerns for the citizen science platform?
column4: Q2: Do you have a personal connection to autism?
column5: Q3: Can we use the information above to inform how we design and build the platform?

column3: I'm concerned that we help people to navigate the complexities of working openly and working online in GitHub. I'm particularly passionate about making sure that people understand that we're showing the process as it is going along, and that means there will be lots of things that are not done yet!
column4: I know someone who is autistic
